location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to John Walter Sherer, Civil Auditor, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is conveying an explanation for a charge on the account of the Bushire Residency in March 1810; the charge was for various small presents given to well-wishers by Nicholas Hankey Smith upon his return from India.
